detectors.description:
PuddleSamurai.pendingPuddle(uint256,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PuddleSamurai.sol#958-969) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-puddleReward = multiplier.mul(puddlePerBlock).mul(pool.allocPoint).div(totalAllocPoint) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PuddleSamurai.sol#965)
	-accPuddlePerShare = accPuddlePerShare.add(puddleReward.mul(1e12).div(lpSupply)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PuddleSamurai.sol#966)
